services.name: General Dentistry
services.description: Comprehensive dental care for all age groups, including routine check-ups and cleaning.

services.name: Cosmetic Dentistry
services.description: Improve the appearance of your teeth with whitening, veneers, and bonding.

services.name: Orthodontics
services.description: Straighten teeth and correct bite issues with braces or aligners.

services.name: Pediatric Dentistry
services.description: Specialized dental care for children to ensure healthy growth and development.

services.name: Periodontics
services.description: Gum disease prevention and treatment, including scaling and root planing.

services.name: Oral Surgery
services.description: Surgical procedures such as wisdom teeth removal and dental implants.

services.name: Endodontics
services.description: Root canal treatments to save damaged or infected teeth.

services.name: Prosthodontics
services.description: Restorative services like dentures, crowns, and bridges.
